column4: I have a bunch of server blades here, no cdrom drive available.. my options are USB or PXE.. what's the easiest option to get ubuntu on them?
ubotu hasn't said anything.. got a URL? can I just chuck the ISO onto my USB drive somehow?
stupid bot ... i'll look, a second
youtube has rickrolled a lot of ppl today
open up that page, open up a new page, THEN kill firefox.
you can't open a new page, it constantly pops a javascript dialog up so you can't do anything else
truecrypt with a fat or ntfs partition in it will work.

cool. just installing easycrypt now.. I figured out how to set up luks but I don't think windows will recognise that (I don't have windows to test either.. will have to set up something for that next)
i've used truecrypt with succes in the past so i know it works.
no you have to get it from their site.
